import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import authUtils from "../utils/auth.util"; function StateLogin() { const isLogin = authUtils.isLogin(); const user = authUtils.getUser(); function onSignOut(e) { e.preventDefault(); localStorage.removeItem("user"); localStorage.removeItem("token"); window.location.reload(); } if (isLogin) { return <>
Welcome, {user.username}
Sign out
; } return ( <>
Sign in
Register
); } function Navbar() { return ( <>
Accueil Citations Quotes About Contact
); } export default Navbar;
